replies.msg:
Cathay Pacific to sack nearly 300 cabin crew in US, calling bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles ‘no long viable’

Cathay Pacific is to sack almost 300 of its staff in the US and close its cabin crew bases in the biggest cutback of employees made by the airline during the coronavirus pandemic.

The airline told staff on Friday that it had to make tough decisions amid the worsening economic impact and employing flight attendants based in the United States was “no longer viable”, according to a memo seen by the Post.

Cathay has virtually grounded all passenger services, operating 3 per cent of its schedule in April and May, with just two flights a week to Los Angeles instead of the around 120 flights weekly.

“As a result of the Covid-19 pandemic which has virtually halted global travel, Cathay Pacific has made the difficult decision to close its US cabin crew bases,” an airline spokeswoman said.

The move affects 286 staff working across bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles, and follows the closure of its Vancouver base in March, affecting 147 jobs, and Toronto the previous year when another 120 people lost their jobs.

“We are devastated,” said Sara Nelson, president of the Association of Flight Attendants-CWA, which represents Cathay crews in the US. “These flight attendants are cherished members of our union.

“We will be working to achieve severance and continued health care for as long as possible. And we will work to support them in every way we can.”

In total, Cathay Pacific employs about 13,000 flight attendants. Outside Hong Kong, it has overseas bases employing cabin crew in London, Bangkok and Singapore.

https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/health-environment/article/3080356/cathay-pacific-sack-nearly-300-cabin-crew-us

replies.msg: 抵場運動輸啦 連登仔係抵輸既

响網上，多年來鬧飛雞嘅人都有若干數量，但我睇得出當中絕大部份都未接觸過真正飛雞，莫講話食，連飛雞朋友都無個，對佢地只有表面嘅認知。 


女人之所以狗衝去做空姐，其實並唔係真正想做空姐呢個職業，而係佢地需要一份空姐性質嘅職業。咩性質呢？就係一份可以令佢免費/廉價去全球各地地標/名勝影相，可以去大量豪華酒店房間/泳池/coffee shop/健身室影相，可以去全球國地購買相對廉價嘅名牌，番工放工一出門一舉手一投足都受人膜拜，撒網收兵當交朋結友，賣身又可以講成戀愛拍拖嘅職業。 


點解咁強調影相呢？因為呢個年代，港女嘅cv就係fb,ig, 同黃浩銘一樣，佢地會花盡心思精力去豐富佢地嘅cv，景越靚，露得越多，狗公質素就越高。有咗一批高質狗公供養，資源多咗，又可以飛少啲，多啲時間扮靚做gym，馬革線變腹肌，無欏變翹臀，然後啲相又索啲，識到嘅男人又再高質啲。呢啲叫以戰養戰，我唔知你地明唔明。 


開頭講過，佢地其實唔係想做空姐，只係想要空姐性質嘅工作，方便佢地達到第二段所講嘅目的。大家諗下，除咗空姐，仲有咩職業有呢幾種特性？事實係有嘅。首先係有錢佬個女，例如何超蓮呢啲，但世上有幾多個何超蓮呢？呢啲好講命水。又或者係大明星都得，即係要做藝人。再落去就係做model，再衰啲就做o靚模。 


但諗真下，以上所講唔係人人都適合做，有錢女講命水，藝人唔係個個可以入行，model又唔夠高，o靚模又不屑去做，咁一個小康之家甚至公屋出身，又自命讀過下書嘅港女，從事咩職業先可以達到第二段所講嘅目的呢？好自然就係空姐。 


空姐仲有一個好處，就係進可攻退可守，佢賭注無做藝人咁大，你做藝人，閒閒地要花十年廿年落去，紅唔起就乜都無，呢世都要孭住過氣二打六之名。但空姐個身份就好用得多，目標未出現果陣就攬住個貞節牌坊當自己做正行，目標出現果陣就話係真愛鍾意佢上進，公係佢贏，字都係佢贏。而且做咗空姐先，之後可以去做藝人，但做咗藝人先，就唔係咁容易接受到做空姐。 


所以，空姐不單只唔係佢地目標，而且只係第一步，有咗空姐呢個身份先有之後漫長嘅部署。 


以上成編文你地可以一句都唔同意，因為都係果句，鬧空姐嘅人我見得多，了解空姐嘅人係好少，最了解空姐嘅，佢地自己又唔會承認，所以世上除咗我應該無第二個講得出呢番說話。 


但你地可以記住我以下呢句說話，真係袋錢落你地袋，就係；今時今日，正行當偏門做，偏門當正行做。明白呢句說話，你會睇通好多社會現像同各行各業嘅搵錢方法。 


呢種人，即使比三千蚊個月佢當係學習/實習津貼，港女依然會仆街咁仆去做。要佢用自僱人士身份簽約無福利都仲得。

Cathay Pacific to sack nearly 300 cabin crew in US, calling bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles ‘no long viable’

Cathay Pacific is to sack almost 300 of its staff in the US and close its cabin crew bases in the biggest cutback of employees made by the airline during the coronavirus pandemic.

The airline told staff on Friday that it had to make tough decisions amid the worsening economic impact and employing flight attendants based in the United States was “no longer viable”, according to a memo seen by the Post.

Cathay has virtually grounded all passenger services, operating 3 per cent of its schedule in April and May, with just two flights a week to Los Angeles instead of the around 120 flights weekly.

“As a result of the Covid-19 pandemic which has virtually halted global travel, Cathay Pacific has made the difficult decision to close its US cabin crew bases,” an airline spokeswoman said.

The move affects 286 staff working across bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles, and follows the closure of its Vancouver base in March, affecting 147 jobs, and Toronto the previous year when another 120 people lost their jobs.

“We are devastated,” said Sara Nelson, president of the Association of Flight Attendants-CWA, which represents Cathay crews in the US. “These flight attendants are cherished members of our union.

“We will be working to achieve severance and continued health care for as long as possible. And we will work to support them in every way we can.”

In total, Cathay Pacific employs about 13,000 flight attendants. Outside Hong Kong, it has overseas bases employing cabin crew in London, Bangkok and Singapore.

國泰（293）機艙服務部總經理毛潔瓊（Jeanette Mao）向以美國為基地全體機組人員發內部信，宣佈美國的機組人員基地（cabin crew bases）將全面關閉，以美國為基地的機組人員將被裁員。

毛潔瓊在信中指，關閉所有美國的機組人員基地是一個非常艱難的決定，有關決定已通知美國空中服務員工會(Association of Flight Attendants-CWA (AFA-CWA))。信中又附上裁員通知，據當地法規，裁員需於60日前通知僱員，因此以美國為基地的空服員最後上班日期為今年6月20日。毛指，目前僅餘的客運需求已消失，集團的客運機隊幾乎停飛，4月國泰前往美國的航班僅餘下每周兩班前往洛杉磯的航班。

據了解，目前國泰於三藩市、洛杉磯均有聘用以美國為基地的機組人員。信中未有交代受影響員工數目。本報正就事件向國泰查詢。
據國泰2019年年報，國泰航空連同其附屬公司在全球僱用逾3.42萬名員工，香港佔約2萬，其餘為香港以外僱員，惟未有細分不同地區僱員數目。
記者：邱曉欣

Cathay Pacific to sack nearly 300 cabin crew in US, calling bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles ‘no long viable’

Cathay Pacific is to sack almost 300 of its staff in the US and close its cabin crew bases in the biggest cutback of employees made by the airline during the coronavirus pandemic.

The airline told staff on Friday that it had to make tough decisions amid the worsening economic impact and employing flight attendants based in the United States was “no longer viable”, according to a memo seen by the Post.

Cathay has virtually grounded all passenger services, operating 3 per cent of its schedule in April and May, with just two flights a week to Los Angeles instead of the around 120 flights weekly.

“As a result of the Covid-19 pandemic which has virtually halted global travel, Cathay Pacific has made the difficult decision to close its US cabin crew bases,” an airline spokeswoman said.

“We are devastated,” said Sara Nelson, president of the Association of Flight Attendants-CWA, which represents Cathay crews in the US. “These flight attendants are cherished members of our union.

“We will be working to achieve severance and continued health care for as long as possible. And we will work to support them in every way we can.”

In total, Cathay Pacific employs about 13,000 flight attendants. Outside Hong Kong, it has overseas bases employing cabin crew in London, Bangkok and Singapore.

quote.msg:
Cathay Pacific to sack nearly 300 cabin crew in US, calling bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles ‘no long viable’

Cathay Pacific is to sack almost 300 of its staff in the US and close its cabin crew bases in the biggest cutback of employees made by the airline during the coronavirus pandemic.

The airline told staff on Friday that it had to make tough decisions amid the worsening economic impact and employing flight attendants based in the United States was “no longer viable”, according to a memo seen by the Post.

Cathay has virtually grounded all passenger services, operating 3 per cent of its schedule in April and May, with just two flights a week to Los Angeles instead of the around 120 flights weekly.

“As a result of the Covid-19 pandemic which has virtually halted global travel, Cathay Pacific has made the difficult decision to close its US cabin crew bases,” an airline spokeswoman said.

The move affects 286 staff working across bases in New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles, and follows the closure of its Vancouver base in March, affecting 147 jobs, and Toronto the previous year when another 120 people lost their jobs.

“We are devastated,” said Sara Nelson, president of the Association of Flight Attendants-CWA, which represents Cathay crews in the US. “These flight attendants are cherished members of our union.

“We will be working to achieve severance and continued health care for as long as possible. And we will work to support them in every way we can.”

In total, Cathay Pacific employs about 13,000 flight attendants. Outside Hong Kong, it has overseas bases employing cabin crew in London, Bangkok and Singapore.
